extension.valueString:
/**
 * By Administrative Gender of Patient Stratifier
 */
define "By Administrative Gender Stratifier":
    case 
        when Patient.gender = 'male' then "Males"
        when Patient.gender = 'female' then "Females"
        else "Other"
    end

/*
 * Disaggregator: Administrative Gender (or Biological Sex)
 */
define "Gender Stratifier":
	IMMZIndCom."By Administrative Gender Stratifier"

/**
 * @dataElement All Doses Administered to Patient to patient ordered newest to oldest
 */
define "Doses Administered to Patient":
  [Immunization] I
    where I.status = 'completed'
    sort by date from (occurrence as FHIR.dateTime) desc

/**
 * @dataElement Diptheria containing Doses Administered to Patient
 */
define "Diphtheria Doses Administered to Patient":
  "Doses Administered to Patient" I
  where
    I.vaccineCode in IMMZc."Diphtheria Vaccine"
Pertussis Booster Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period

/**
 * Pertussis Doses Administered to Patient
 */
define "Pertussis Booster Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period":
    IMMZCom."Diphtheria Doses Administered to Patient" I 
    where IMMZCom.ToDate(I.occurrence) during "Measurement Period"
        and (singleton from I.protocolApplied).doseNumber > 3

/** 
 * Disaggregator: Dose Sequence
 */
define "Dose Sequence Stratifier":
	IMMZIndCom."Pertussis Booster Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period" I
	return (singleton from I.protocolApplied).doseNumber

/**
 * By Administrative Gender of Patient Stratifier
 */
define "By Geographic Region Stratifier":
    First(Patient.address A where A.use in { 'home' }).state

/*
 * Disaggregator: Geographic Region
 */
define "Geographic Region Stratifier":
	IMMZIndCom."By Geographic Region Stratifier"

/*
 * Numerator: Number of administrations of booster vaccine containing a pertussis component during the reporting period
 * Numerator Computation: COUNT immunization events WHERE administered product is a Pertussis containing vaccine (IMMZ.A1.DE12) and dose > 3 during reporting period.
 */
define "numerator":
	exists(IMMZIndCom."Pertussis Booster Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period")
Pertussis Booster Doses Recommended During Reporting Period

/** 
 * Pertussis Booster Doses recommended during reporting period - 
 *  This is used since the country should define the rules which recommend an Pertussis booster dose (configuration, age, sex, etc.)
 */
define "Pertussis Booster Doses Recommended During Reporting Period":
    [ImmunizationRecommendation] IR
    where exists(IR.recommendation RC where exists(RC.dateCriterion DC where date from DC.value during "Measurement Period")
    and RC.doseNumber > 3
    and RC.vaccineCode in IMMZc."Pertussis Vaccine")

/*
 * Denominator: Number of immunization recommendations for pertussis boosters (doses >= 4) due during reporting period.
 * Denominator Computation: COUNT immunization recommendation WHERE recommended product is pertussis containing vaccine (IMMZ.A1.DE12) AND due date during reporting period.
 */
define "denominator":
	exists(IMMZIndCom."Pertussis Booster Doses Recommended During Reporting Period")

name: IMMZIND45
title: IMMZ.IND.45 Immunization coverage for Pertussis containing vaccine boosters (Computed Denominator)
description: Compares the administered booster dose of pertussis containing vaccine (dose 4) with the number of immunization recommendations for boosters of pertussis containing vaccines expressed as a percentage.

population.description: Number of administrations of booster vaccine containing a pertussis component during the reporting period
Number of immunization recommendations for pertussis boosters (doses >= 4) due during reporting period.
